mapper.select: SELECT c.course_name, c.course_id, c.course_current_enrollment FROM course c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.professor_id = #{professorId} AND c.course_status in ('open', 'OPEN')

select st.student_id, st.student_name, st.student_num, c.course_name, c.course_id, c.course_current_enrollment, c.course_period, d.dept_name, p.professor_name, sc.score_mid, sc.score_final, sc.score_total, sc.score_grade, sc.score_etc from course c, student st, dept d, score sc, registration r, professor p where 1 = 1 and c.professor_id = #{professorId} and c.course_id = #{courseId} and c.course_status in ('OPEN', 'open') and c.dept_id = d.dept_id and c.professor_id = r.professor_id and c.course_id = r.course_id and r.student_id = st.student_id and r.course_id = sc.course_id and r.student_id = sc.student_id and sc.course_id = c.course_id and p.professor_id = c.professor_id
